channel.title: Comments on: Programming and Making Use of Structure in Math
channel.description: iteration, making, building, and coding in education

item.title: By: Evan Weinberg
item.dc:creator: Evan Weinberg
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013/10/14/programming-and-making-use-of-structure-in-math/#comment-272">David Wees (@davidwees)</a>.
Please do - I think getting these examples out there is important.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to David Wees (@davidwees).

Please do – I think getting these examples out there is important.

item.title: By: David Wees (@davidwees)
item.dc:creator: David Wees (@davidwees)
item.description: I hope you don't mind if I use this example in a presentation I've been tinkering with and doing for a while. I keep looking for specific examples from the field to try and explain how I see the intersection of programming and mathematical thinking.
item.content:encoded: I hope you don’t mind if I use this example in a presentation I’ve been tinkering with and doing for a while. I keep looking for specific examples from the field to try and explain how I see the intersection of programming and mathematical thinking.
